text: The following is a list of settlements in Sri Lanka with a population of over 50,000. == List == City Image DSDivision District Province Population Area Density(/km²) Co-ordinates Conurbation(2012 est) Municipality(2012 census) km² mi² Colomboකොළඹ கொழும்பு Colombo / Thimbirigasyaya Colombo Western 752,993 561,314 14 Dehiwala-Mount Laviniaදෙහිවල- ගල්කිස්ස தெஹிவளை- கல்கிசை Dehiwala Colombo Western 245,974 184,468 8 Moratuwaමොරටුව மொறட்டுவை Moratuwa Colombo Western 207,755 168,280 9 Sri Jayawardenepura Kotteශ්‍රී ජයවර්ධනපුර කෝට්ටේ ஶ்ரீ ஜெயவர்த்தனபுரம் கோட்டை Kotte Colombo Western 135,806 107,925 7 Dambullaදඹුල්ල தம்பள்ளை Dambulla Matale Central 72,306 23,814 21 Negomboමීගමුව நீர்கொழும்பு Negombo Gampaha Western 127,754 142,449 12 Kandyමහනුවර கண்டி Kandy Kandy Central 125,351 98,828 10 Kalmunaiකල්මුනේ கல்முனை Kalmunai Muslim / Kalmunai Tamil / Sainthamarathu Ampara Eastern 106,783 99,893 9 Vavuniyaවවුනියාව வவுனியா Vavuniya Vavuniya Northern 99,653 34,816 Galleගාල්ල காலி Galle Galle Southern 99,478 86,333 7 Trincomaleeත්‍රිකුණාමලය திருகோணமலை TrincomaleeTown andGravets Trincomalee Eastern 99,135 48,351 Batticaloaමඩකලපුව மட்டக்களப்பு Manmunai North Batticaloa Eastern 92,332 86,227 29 Jaffnaයාපනය யாழ்ப்பாணம் Jaffna / Nallur Jaffna Northern 88,138 80,829 8 Mataleමාතලේ மாத்தளை Matale Matale Central 78,864 38,299 10 4,051 Katunayakeකටුනායක கட்டுநாயகம் Katana Gampaha Western 76,816 60,915 21 2,794 Kolonnawaකොලොන්නාව கொழுன்னை Kolonnawa Colombo Western 64,887 60,044 Anuradhapuraඅනුරාධපුරය அனுராதபுரம் Anuradhapura Anuradhapura North Central 63,208 50,595 14 Ratnapuraරත්නපුර இரத்தினபுரி Ratnapura Ratnapura Sabaragamuwa 52,170 47,105 8 ==References== Sri Lanka * Sri Lanka city
